text.english: Click here to see your Reports.
text.spanish: Haga clic aquí para ver sus Informes.

text.english: As you complete activities in each unit of your level of Online Practice you can collect stars. The more points you score, the more stars you collect!
If you score 30% of the total possible points in a unit you will be awarded a star.
If you score 70% of the total possible points in a unit you will be awarded two stars.
If you score 90% of the total possible points in a unit you will be awarded three stars.
If you score 100% of the total possible points in a unit you will be awarded a bonus trophy.
text.turkish: Bir ünitede toplam olası puanların %100’ünü alırsanız bir bonusla ödüllendirilirsiniz.
text.spanish: Si obtiene el 100% del total de puntos posibles en una unidad, se le otorgará un trofeo extra.
text.arabic: إذاأحرزت100% من مجموع النقاط الممكنة في وحدة ما, فسوف يتم منحك ميداليةمكافأة.

text.english: This is your Dashboard. The Online Practice is divided into several areas, for example, Tests, Vocabulary, and Practice. The Dashboard shows your activity results for a level across the different areas.
Results for activities within different areas are displayed as a percentage based on the average score of all completed activities in an area within a level.
text.turkish: Farklı beceri alanlarındaki aktivite sonuçları bir seviye içerisindeki beceri alanında tamamlanan tüm aktivitelerin ortalama puanına göre bir yüzde değer olarak görüntülenir.
text.spanish: Los resultados para actividades dentro de las diferentes áreas de habilidades se muestran como un porcentaje en base a la puntuación media de todas las actividades realizadas en un área de habilidades dentro de un nivel.
text.arabic: يتم عرض نتائج الأنشطة التي تنتمي لمجالات مختلفة من المهارات كنسبة مئوية على أساس متوسط درجات كل الأنشطة المُنجَزة في مجال من المهارات خلال مستوى ما.

text.english: The number of completed activities is shown here along with the total number of activities in an area.
